item.title: Why I Joined Decodable
item.description: Table of Contents The Space: Real-Time Stream Processing The Environment: A Start-up The Team: One of a Kind Outlook It’s my first week as a software engineer at Decodable, a start-up building a serverless real-time data platform! When I shared this news on social media yesterday, folks were not only super supportive and excited for me (thank you so much for all the nice words and wishes!), but some also asked about the reasons behind my decision for switching jobs and going to a start-up, after having worked for Red Hat for the last few years.
